hanzi-su-wiki:
遊

Значения

Играть, развлекаться, гулять; путешествие, экскурсия; путешествовать

Мнемоника

  • Искажено. Плыть 浮 в любом направлении 方, двигаться 辶 без цели.

  • "Ребёнок 子 с флагом выходит играть."

Варианты

游

yóu
wander, roam, travel
блуждать, бродить, путешествовать
rtega_mnemonic:
遊遊RSwander, roam, travel, play
  • a ship swimming 斿 in the water going ⻌ over long distances: wandering the seas; children swimming 斿 and running ⻌ around: typical playful occupation during travel
游
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 斿 indicates the sound; 辶 (walk) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
週遊 [ zhōu yóu ]: variant of 周遊 |周游 , to tour; to travel around
悠哉遊哉 [ yōu zāi yóu zāi ]: (adj) leisurely and carefree
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking
    • 斿 [ yóu ] to swim; to move freely
heisig_chinese_memo: This banner is on a bus going down the road advertising kiddie tours. (children focused sightseeing tours)&nbsp
heisig_constituent: play, banner, direction, compass, direction, reclining, lying down, child, road
koohiiStory1: The BANNER warns that CHILDREN PLAY on the ROAD.
koohiiStory2: There is always a stupid banner talking about children at play near the road. They mean "drive slowly", but it sounds like its slow(stupid) children that are at play.
jp_example_words:
遊牧(ゆうぼく): nomadism
遊園地(ゆうえんち): amusement park
遊び(あそび): play
遊ぶ(あそぶ): play, make a visit (esp. for pleasure), be idle, do nothing
jp_readingExamples: 遊戯 (ゆうぎ), 遊離 (ゆうり), 交遊 (こうゆう), 遊ぶ (あそ.ぶ)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: On a scooter running in one direction is a gun-toting child. This is a terribly dangerous situation, but to the child it is just play.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine a child riding a scooter with a gun having a good time. "Come play with me!" they shout. "No!" you yell back.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Everything is play for youths (ゆう), even if it's a terrible, scary, not good situation like this one.
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
Imagine trying to explain to the youth that this is not play and that they should stop, but them youths can't stop playing.
P.S. From the WaniKani staff to you: Don't let youths play with guns, please.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 遜 (したがう、ソン скромность)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man knows the way to make the child (斿) move (⻌) and play
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This banner is on a bus going down the road advertising kiddie tours. (children focused sightseeing tours)&nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscriptions from "辵" from "斿", "斿" is also a sound symbol. " Scallop along lower edge of flag " like a child walking hand-held flags, " Chuo " elephant foot walking in the streets, is a " tour " of the signifier, the original meaning of the procession, travel. See " Yu ". The inscriptions of Jin Wen said travel far, and Zhongshan Wangding: "Travel to a country where the widows rent exclusively." It means that the widows entrust the country (to Simajia) and travel far.

Warring States bamboo pass off as " a ", "bamboo book two. "Zigao" Jane 7: "Xian Wang Zhi You (You) Tao", "Yu Tao" means to follow the previous king and act according to the Tao of the first king (Qiu Xigui).
humanum_short_description_en: From "辵", "斿" also sounds. The oracle bone inscriptions and early bronze inscriptions write " Yu ", like a child traveling with a banner. " You " is the last word for "斿". After the Spring and Autumn Period, "彳" (like a road) or "辵" (like a foot on the road) is added to indicate a trip.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「辵」從「斿」，「斿」亦是聲符。「斿」象小孩手持旗子行走，「辵」象腳在路上走，是「遊」的意符，本義是遊行、出遊。參見「斿」。金文表示遠遊，中山王鼎：「寡人專賃之邦而去之遊」，表示寡人把國家交托(給司馬賈)，而去遠遊。

　　戰國竹簡通假為「由」，《上博竹書二．子羔》簡7：「先王之遊(由)道」，「由道」指遵循先王，按先王之道行事(裘錫圭)。
humanum_short_description: 從「辵」，「斿」亦聲。甲骨文及早期金文寫作「斿」，象小孩執旌旗出遊。「遊」是「斿」的後起字，春秋以後增「彳」(象道路)或「辵」(象腳在路上走)，表示出遊。

See " Yu". The inscriptions of Jin Wen said travel far, and Zhongshan Wangding: "Travel to a country where the widows rent exclusively." It means that the widows entrust the country (to Simajia) and travel far. Warring States bamboo pass off as " a", "bamboo book two. "Zigao" Jane 7: "Xian Wang Zhi You (You) Tao", "Yu Tao" means to follow the previous king and act according to the Tao of the first king (Qiu Xigui).

遊字的基本解释

遊
yóu
同“游”④⑤。

遊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yóu］
［《廣韻》以周切，平尤，以。］
亦作“逰1”。
(1)游览；云游。
(2)游乐；游荡。
(3)古代帝王春天巡行。
(4)冶游。
(5)游观的处所。
(6)交游；结交。
(7)结交的朋友。
(8)求学。
(9)指求仕，求职。
(10)游说。
(11)行走。
(12)无官职者；无职业者。
(13)放纵，放任；无拘束。
(14)潜水浮行；游泳。
(15)行动；实施。
(16)虚浮不实。参见“遊言”。
(17)飘流。
(18)运转；运行。
(19)通“由”。

遊字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　遊； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1261第11
〔古文〕?汓?【唐韻】以周切【集韻】【韻會】夷周切【正韻】于求切，?音猷。【玉篇】遨遊也。【書·大禹謨】罔遊于逸。【詩·邶風】以遨以遊。【禮·學記】息焉遊焉。【註】遊，謂無事閒暇總在于學也。　又友也，交遊也。【禮·曲禮】交遊稱其信也。【戰國策】士未有爲君盡遊者。【註】遊，猶友也。言不盡于交遊之道。　又叶延知切，音移。【班彪·閒居賦】望常山之峩峩，登北岳以高遊。嘉孝武之乾乾，親釋躬于伯姫。　又叶羊諸切，音余。【黃庭經】五靈夜燭煥入區，子存內皇與我遊。

遊字的源字形

金文楷体

暂无。

tour
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yóu］
["Guangyun" cuts with Zhou, Pingyou, with. ]
Also known as "Tai 1".
(1) Tour; travel around.
(2) Pleasure; wandering.
(3) The ancient emperors traveled in spring.
(4) Yeyou.
(5) Youguan's premises.
(6) Make friends; make friends.
(7) The friends you make.
(8) Go to school.
(9) Refers to job seeking, job hunting.
(10) Lobbying.
(11) Walking.
(12) Those without official positions; those without occupations.
(13) Indulgence, laissez-faire; unrestrained.
(14) Diving and floating; swimming.
(15) Action; implementation.
(16) Floating and untrue. See "traveling".
(17) Drifting.
(18) Running; running.
(19) Through "you".

yóu
вм. 游

遊

Значения

Играть, развлекаться, гулять; путешествие, экскурсия; путешествовать

Мнемоника

  • Искажено. Плыть 浮 в любом направлении 方, двигаться 辶 без цели.

  • "Ребёнок 子 с флагом выходит играть."

Варианты

游

Radicals: 方, 子  (direction, child, scooter, gun)
Meaning Mnemonic
On a scooter running in one direction is a gun-toting child. This is a terribly dangerous situation, but to the child it is just play.
Imagine a child riding a scooter with a gun having a good time. "Come play with me!" they shout. "No!" you yell back.
Reading Mnemonic
Everything is play for youths (ゆう), even if it's a terrible, scary, not good situation like this one.
Imagine trying to explain to the youth that this is not play and that they should stop, but them youths can't stop playing.
P.S. From the WaniKani staff to you: Don't let youths play with guns, please.

込 (внутрь), 子 (ребёнок), 方 (сторона)
Сравни: 遜 (したがう、ソン скромность)
